https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jUV8EqiDuPpfxlkRWTgk6JFUAvM.jpg Marko lives a quiet life with his mother Tina and younger sister Nina. In addition to studying medicine, he works as a paramedic and is on duty at the medical center most of the time. When it seems that another night shift will pass without events, a car with a wounded person is brought to the entrance towards the end of the working day. Marko takes care of the wounded man together with his girlfriend Nata≈°a to the best of his ability. Despite severe pressure, they succeed. Breaking Point
